title.value: Promoting informed and shared decisions about eHealth solutions for older people and their informal caregivers
title.justification: The title is explicitly mentioned in the project's description and objectives section.
title.quote: Project title : Promoting informed and shared decisions about eHealth solutions for older people and their informal caregivers

extractions.description: This project aims to develop and test a decision support system for older people with cognitive impairment to select eHealth solutions. It involves a participatory approach, engaging various target groups such as people at risk of cognitive impairment and their caregivers. The project outlines four phases: interview study, environmental scan, tool development, and evaluation.

type.justification: The paper describes empirical activities such as interviews, environmental scans, and evaluations.
type.quote: The proposal is well-written and describes the development and testing of a decision support system for older people with cognitive impairment to select eHealth solutions.

name.justification: The primary focus of the project is to develop a decision support system for eHealth solutions for elderly people with cognitive impairments.
name.quote: Scientific quality: This is a well written proposal that aims to develop, using participatory methods, an electronic decision support tool for people with dementia and their carers.

name.justification: The project involves user-centered design approaches and decision support systems, which are related to HCI.
name.quote: The qualitative work package aims to interview 60 participants... The team covers psychology, health and mechanical engineering but expertise in HCI, usability and interface design are noted as valuable additions.
